content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Hello Hassan, thank you for your interest in the apartment. I would be happy to discuss the rental price with you. May I know what your budget is for this rental?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am looking for the lowest possible price. Can you tell me the current rental price of the apartment?
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Sure, the current rental price for this apartment is 800 Euros per month. However, I am open to negotiating on the price if you have any specific requirements or concerns.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am interested in negotiating the rental price. Can we agree on a price?
I agree to the price of 700 Euros per month.
TERMINATE
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for your interest in the apartment. I understand that you are looking for a lower rental price. However, I am sorry to say that I cannot accept a rental price of 700 Euros per month as it is below the market value of the apartment. My minimum rental price for this apartment is 800 Euros per month. If you are willing to pay the market value, I would be happy to discuss further details and arrange the rental agreement.
name: Heinrich Heine
